    • Uses of FacetBuilder in org.elasticsearch.action.search

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.action.search with parameters of type FacetBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchRequestBuilder SearchRequestBuilder.addFacet(FacetBuilder facet)
      Deprecated. 
      Facets are deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use aggregations instead.

    • Uses of FacetBuilder in org.elasticsearch.search.builder

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.search.builder with parameters of type FacetBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a facet to perform as part of the search.

    • Uses of FacetBuilder in org.elasticsearch.search.facet

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.search.facet that return FacetBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FacetBuilder FacetBuilder.facetFilter(FilterBuilder filter) 
      FacetBuilder FacetBuilder.global(boolean global)
      Marks the facet to run in a global scope, not bounded by any query.
      FacetBuilder FacetBuilder.mode(FacetBuilder.Mode mode) 
      FacetBuilder FacetBuilder.nested(String nested)
      Sets the nested path the facet will execute on.

    • Uses of FacetBuilder in org.elasticsearch.search.facet.geodistance

      Subclasses of FacetBuilder in org.elasticsearch.search.facet.geodistance 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GeoDistanceFacetBuilder
      A geo distance builder allowing to create a facet of distances from a specific location including the number of hits within each distance range, and aggregated data (like totals of either the distance or cusotm value fields).
